application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of crime prevention measures pursuant to condition 22 of planning permission ref: 165514OPDFUL dated 20/10/2023 for:  Redevelopment of the site to provide a single storey basement with a part10, part 36 storey building comprising 350 residential units and ancillary facilities (Use Class C3) with a mix of studio, 1 bed, 2 bed and 3 bed flats and 503qm (GIA) of flexible use class E and/or Sui Generis (pub/wine bar/drinking establishment) and/or F1 and/or F2 floorspace and a landscaped public realm, together with associated public and private amenity space, cycle parking, car parking, servicing, landscaping and other associated works (Full Planning Application accompanied by an Environmental Impact Assessment)
